articles.title: Latest POCO F2 Pro leak reaffirms key features, hints at an 'affordable' price tag - Android Central
articles.description: An early retailer listing suggests the POCO F2 Pro will be more affordable than other Snapdragon 865-powered phones that have been released so far. The phone is expected to be announced sometime later this quarter.
articles.content: Last week, a report had claimed that the next POCO flagship will be priced significantly higher than the F1 and is going to be launched in several markets across Europe. The rumored POCO F2 Pro has now been listed by online retailer GearBest, reaffirming the … [+657 chars]
